Description: Glioblastoma is a type of brain tumor that originates in the brain's glial cells. It is typically aggressive and malignant, and it can cause significant damage to surrounding brain tissue.
Possible_Causes: Exposure to certain chemicals or radiation
Recommended_Actions: Surgery to remove as much of the tumor as possible
Radiation therapy to kill any remaining cancer cells
Chemotherapy to slow the growth of the tumor and prevent it from spreading
